title.rendered: ARTIZAN JOYERIA UNVEILS THE SECOND DROP OF THE SS23 MOVE COLLECTION

content.rendered:
SS23 MOVE 2nd Drop Hero Image

SS23 MOVE 2nd Drop Alternate Image

Artizan Joyeria Logo

ARTIZAN JOYERIA’S SS23 MOVE COLLECTION SECOND DROP: CONTINUING TO INSPIRE MOVEMENT AND DEFYING EXPECTATIONS

MIAMI, FLORIDA, USA, May 31, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The Miami-based jewelry brand, Artizan Joyeria, known for its relentless pursuit of individuality, empowerment, and defiance of the norm, is excited to announce the anticipated second drop of its SS23 collection, MOVE. This inspiring continuation of the original MOVE collection further exemplifies the brand’s commitment to designing bold, dynamic pieces that embolden the wearer’s spirit of change and personal growth.

The second drop of the MOVE collection celebrates the extraordinary resilience we can exhibit when embracing new challenges, seeking personal growth, and defying expectations. These artfully crafted pieces are designed for the courageous, the audacious, and the bold – those who choose to make their move unapologetically.

Crafted from water and tarnish resistant stainless steel, the latest pieces to join the MOVE collection continue to push the envelope of jewelry design. The collection features a wide range of pieces, from subtly intricate designs to audacious, chunky elements. A bold symbiosis of classic and edgy intertwined– echoing the brand’s philosophy of celebrating individuality and authenticity.

“We’ve been overwhelmed by the positive reception of the MOVE collection and are thrilled to offer our customers a fresh array of designs to continue inspiring their journey of personal growth and empowerment,” stated Keren Yoshua, lead designer at Artizan Joyeria.

The second drop of the SS23 MOVE collection will be available for purchase starting Sunday, June 4th, 2023, at artizanjoyeria.com and select retail outlets. The brand will host a digital launch where customers will have the opportunity to explore the new additions to the collection.

Artizan Joyeria continues to disrupt the jewelry industry, providing accessible luxury pieces crafted with exceptional materials and unmatched attention to detail. The second drop of the SS23 MOVE collection is a testament to Artizan Joyeria’s unwavering dedication to crafting pieces that not only adorn but also empower. For more information on the second drop of the MOVE collection, or to explore the designs in detail, visit artizanjoyeria.com/collections/what-s-new.

ABOUT ARTIZAN JOYERIA

Artizan Joyeria is a Miami-based jewelry brand renowned for its commitment to fostering individuality, empowerment, and the defiance of conventions. Established in 2008, the women owned business has focused on creating unique, high-quality jewelry pieces that inspire and encourage women to embrace their unapologetically authentic selves. By utilizing exceptional quality materials and designs, Artizan Joyeria makes luxury accessible to all while maintaining a strong bond with its customers and continuing its trajectory of growth and evolution within the industry.

Sofia Medina
Artizan Joyeria
